roleset.name: shake
roleset.note: TREMOR-N NOTES: Based on Sharp and Thyme data. Comparison to tremble.01. Tremble.01 is a member of VN classes modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3 and body_internal_states-40.6. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from tremor.01-n)

roleset.name: natural disaster: minor earthquake
roleset.note: TREMOR-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor.

roles.note: The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.

example.name: tremor-n: arg
example.text: ... followed by another tremor of 2.9 on the Richter Scale at 11.40am today, Met officials said.
